title: Perfectbaby
author: Perfectbaby
content: Well I know say e no easy with us here but I go also like to address something here because a tree doesn't make a forest rather a robber tree always claims to be the fastest growing tree that occupies the forest so quickly and so easily.If you watch wetin I tok well e get meaning but only those who doesn't know what it means go begin run mouth. We know say this place na people first discover am and some people discovered here by themselves so, them try to stand by themselves while those who was brought here are being coach and mentored by their mentors but that notwistanding. We should always try our best as possible to consult them in all difficulties because I believe they still have important roles to play in our lives that trying to outsmart them thinking we can do anything in the forum since that we have access to post any place or we can now be creative to start receiving merits so we don't need them again, my dear you are making a very big silly mistake because when e red you go still run go meet am.The thing is, before you carry out any action always seek for the face of your mentor despite say you dey read like computer e still get things you never understand here, same is me as well if you watch my post them I never too dey go english board I just dey here dey cover myself small make my leg strong and make i know more things before I go begin run express wey. If you never understand here come back to our local board seek idea or even go back to your mentor for guidance than say you begin do anyway here thinking say here na other social media wey you fit carry play as you like or even dey change change password as you like, come if you jonse omo you go collect wotowoto because those people wey una see outside here no even want us to grow here talk less of say you go jonse outside. Have this in back of your mind say, here no get Mercy as soon as you lose guard you go collect no be me but people wey no like us go still treat your matta, so came down hustle no need to rush because here no be placed you go carry play.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Of course loyalty dey very important, you can never outgrow your masters, no matter what cos there's always a great level of wisdom that comes with existing in something for a longer period of time. A lot is needed to learn by a new person in this forum and you can't learn it if you turn a proud peacock to your senior men. Loyalty can earn you their guidance and support and even help you rank up faster in the forum. I still submit all my topics for  approval before creating a thread. Yes, I do and some are  rejected by them,I only post the ones they approve because they're more experienced than me in the forum and they always point out the irrelevance in some of my  topics which I even fail to see.  Humility will earn you what millions of Naira wouldn't give you.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: Suprisingly how some persons will decide to behave wild thinking they have arrived. They fail to understand what most other boards take us for, most likely as scammers and they are not happy to see us here in this forum achieving certain ranks why not we comport ourselves(not exempting my self, still a newbie) stay humble learn from those above us, there are certain people I respect so much in this our local board, when ever I see there post or comment I take my time to go through every details to expand my knowledge in this forum so as to avoid bringing back lashing to our board

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Honestly, the benefits of being kind and humble is way too much. What humility go fit give you, omo money no go fit give you. Many young people dey see am say if you dey humble, you go lower your self-esteem as a person but no be so the matter really be. What is the thing is, you create a more understanding between yourself and that person which give your master or whoever it is the confidence to rely more on you.When you are humble, you make people become for valued and comfortable around you. If you remove your ego from your life and come down to earth. Vice-versa, When you dey portray ego, those people wey dey close to you go feel bad and inferior.When you are humble, you will have the ability to learn. Plenty people wey dey humble, dem dey get the loyalty and respect wey they make them learn quickly. There's a lot of information out there that your masters have, when you dey humble, them go give you that access to learn about those things that as though you would not.And many more, na why e dey important make person they calm down dey loyal and trustworthy to their masters. E no dey easy to be humble, but it is great if you are humble.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: Humbleness pays a lot, sometimes the recommendation people get today is because some individuals see them as humble people, I have a friend who worked in a firm, and the head of his department couldn't see any good side of him because the department was a sadist, but the MD of the place has already know the guy as a good and humble young man, a day came when the head of the department wrote to the MD that he needs capable hands to work with not that guy in question, the head of depart pushed for the sack of the young man but Md said no, instead scaling the guy, MD told him to be working with him directly and his salary was increased, my advice is anywhere you find yourself make sure that you behave nice, some people might hate you, some of them will also see that good in you and you will be rewarded soon or later, this will be when you least expect it.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Going by your title, I agree that it pays to be humble, and yes, if one is humble to whoever is their mentor, they definitely will learn fast and even become better than their master in some area, but that doesn't mean that a master is never a master. A master is always a master, and a good master would want their boy to exploit. This forum is very large with different boards; there are even some that seem hidden, and if one claims to be smarter than their mentor, whereas they are still in their early stages, they might not get very exposed to some things they are supposed to know. Even if they do, it will be very long before they can get to understand how everything works.

It really pays to be humble but some people thinks being humble people will take advantage of you which it will look as if you are being called fool, sometimes it is even bettert be called  fool just because you really understand where you are heading to in life.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: You see any thing concerning apprenticeship, humility should be the first aim of the apprentice, humility is the only thing that could make the master lick out enough information to his apprentice, so even in this forum I urge every one to be humble so the blessings of our boss would not depart from us. Even in the Holy Bible it teaches us to be humble in 1 Peter 5:6 "Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time" same for anything that has higher authority over you, if we refuse to stay humble to higher authorities then we plan for destruction. No boss would be happy his boy is not humble to him, just as DaNNy001 said all masters has secrets to teach and for that secret to be taught to his student they have to earn it by showing their seriousness and humility. So my advise to newbies abeg this period our boss dem dey pepe, make we no go do watin go make dem give our account negative tag our even report us to moderator, e no go nice for us if we start to get issues with higher authority for this forum and precisely our naija board, if we humble ourselves you go see say e nor go tay before we go grow our account to take dey get one or two.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: The way wey some of us take carry this forum for head Sha dey surprise me sometimes.. Anyways, na wetin e go be, Las Las, na God dey help man, no be the other way round.Still on still, the op talk some sense, me when I join this forum, I joined on my own, Infact, na when I dey search something about bitcoin on Google, one of the search results wey I click carry me enter this forum, I was just following some threads on the forum until about a month when I decided to sign up.There was no local board then, I was very much into altcoins so the altcoin board was majorly my base...I don't want to start going too deep into my story, but what I have to say is, for anyone who is confident enough to go out from the local board, please do it, read and understand the forum rules and adhere to them all, you will have no issues, here no be person company, or person papa property, make we do away with all this God-fatherism stuffs, e no help us as a country in terms of politics, e no go still help us if we begin to practice am for this forum.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Quote from: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange on November 01, 2023, 09:53:31 PM This forum is very large with different boards; there are even some that seem hidden, and if one claims to be smarter than their mentor, whereas they are still in their early stages, they might not get very exposed to some things they are supposed to know. Even if they do, it will be very long before they can get to understand how everything works.The Importance of this can never be overestimated. This forum is not just big, nor large, but massive. Its size can only be Imagined. My mentors continue to show me around on the daily and when the need arises. The more I know my whereabouts in the forum and how to properly engage, the more it seems I know nothing compared to the many things that is still left to know. You can never know all, and even if you know past your mentors in some certain areas, you will still need them, and it is advised to keep a good relationship with them as two good heads are surely better than one. There are times when a student has learned enough and turns a colleague to the master.  Yes, it happens, but be a good colleague, respect your one-time mentor and never forget the sacrifice he made for you on your way up. With these good behaviors, you will earn a good name and continue to excel in your struggles, especially in this forum where good recommendations can put you in better the space of opportunities.

comments.body: Loyalty is profitable when you do everything possible to follow the rules that governed this platform which are some of the things that will make it profitable in the future. comments.author: DEAstriker
comments.body: Humility is an underrated quality in today's world, but it can be extremely valuable. When you're humble, you're able to recognize your own strengths and weaknesses, and you're more open to learning and growing. This can lead to better relationships, improved decision-making, and ultimately, greater success. So, I say, embrace your humility and reap the rewards! Cause being humble will help you archive so many things in life.. Humble to your boss, to your parents, always be humble in any place or environment you find yourself cause no one knows tomorrow.
